meanings.definition: A type of partridge bird native to Eurasia.
meanings.sent1: The chukar bird has distinctive markings on its body.
meanings.sent2: I saw a chukar flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chukar refuse to attend the bird party? It wanted to be a lone ranger.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the forest like the call of a chukar.
meanings.sent5: The chukar's call sounded like a melody in the quiet morning.

meanings.definition: To play a game of chuck-a-luck.
meanings.sent1: Let's chukar tonight and have some fun!
meanings.sent2: They chukared all night long at the casino.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to chukar instead of watching a movie.
meanings.sent4: His luck seemed to chukar with every roll of the dice.
meanings.sent5: Chukaring with friends always brings excitement and laughter.
